scripts.deps: brew install yarn caddy cmake jq ninja python2 gdrive git-crypt && brew install flatbuffers --head && python -m pip install --user -r firmware/esp-idf/requirements.txt
scripts.docs: rm -r docs/* && doxygen _docs/Doxyfile && cp electrical/*_BOM.csv docs/
scripts.toolchain: which xtensa-esp32-elf-gcc 2>/dev/null || (cd firmware && (ls xtensa-esp32-elf 2>/dev/null || (ls xtensa-esp32-elf-osx-1.22.0-80-g6c4433a-5.2.0.tar.gz 2>/dev/null || curl -LO https://dl.espressif.com/dl/xtensa-esp32-elf-osx-1.22.0-80-g6c4433a-5.2.0.tar.gz) && tar -xf xtensa-esp32-elf-osx-1.22.0-80-g6c4433a-5.2.0.tar.gz) && cd - && ln -sf `pwd`/firmware/xtensa-esp32-elf/bin/* node_modules/.bin)
scripts.postinstall: yarn deps && yarn toolchain && cd "functions" && yarn install --ignore-engines && cd - && cd "scripts" && yarn install && cd - && cd "webcomponents" && yarn install && cd -
scripts.build.test: cd "webcomponents" && yarn build.test && cd - && cd "functions" && yarn build && cd - && cd "scripts" && yarn scriptId.test && cd -
scripts.build.production: cd "webcomponents" && yarn build.production && cd - && cd "functions" && yarn build && cd - && cd "scripts" && yarn scriptId.production && cd -
scripts.deploy.test: cd "webcomponents" && yarn build.test && cd - && cd "scripts" && yarn deploy.test && cd - && cd "functions" && yarn deploy.test && cd - && firebase deploy -P test
scripts.deploy.production: cd "webcomponents" && yarn build.production && cd - && cd "scripts" && yarn deploy.production && cd - && cd "functions" && yarn deploy.production && cd - && firebase deploy -P production
